caption.title: Microfluidic single-cell cultivation platform used in this study.
caption.p: (A) Photograph of the assembled microfluidic chip. (B) Overview over the four channels on each chip. (C) Detail of the cultivation chambers (green, dimensions 80 μm × 90 μm, height 4.5 μm) between two supply channels (blue, width 100 μm, height 15 μm), red arrows show cultivation medium flow. (D) SEM image of the PDMS chip showing one chamber.
